manifest_description.message: Hides the duration of videos and other information on Twitch.tv to prevent spoilers when watching e-sports or sports videos.

player_showHideDuration_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

player_showHideDuration_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the hidden state.

player_jumpBackward.description: Label of the Jump Backward button.

player_jumpForward.description: Label of the Jump Forward button.

player_jump_help.message: Format: "2" for 2 minutes or "1h2m3s" for 1 hour, 2 minutes and 3 seconds
player_jump_help.description: The help message to be displayed for the Jump Distance input.

player_jump_err.description: The error message to be displayed if the Jump Distance is invalid.

videoListItem_showHideTitle_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Title button for the visible state.

videoListItem_showHideTitle_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Title button for the visible state.

videoListItem_showHidePreview_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Preview button for the visible state.

videoListItem_showHidePreview_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Preview button for the visible state.

videoListItem_showHideDuration_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

videoListItem_showHideDuration_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

popup_sfmState_UNSUPPORTED_tooltip.message: The current page is not a supported video platform

popup_sfmState_CHANNEL_DEPENDENT_tooltip.message: Spoiler-Free Mode is active on selected channels

popup_sfmEnabled_ineffective_disabledGlo.message: Spoiler-Free Mode is disabled on the global level.

popup_sfmEnabled_ineffective_enabledGlob.message: Spoiler-Free Mode is enabled on the global level.

popup_sfmEnabled_ineffective_disabledOnP.message: Spoiler-Free Mode is disabled on the platform level.

popup_sfmEnabled_ineffective_enabledOnPl.message: Spoiler-Free Mode is enabled on the platform level.

popup_openOptions.description: Label of the Options... button on the popup menu.

options_sfmEnabled_channels.description: Label of the Channels text area tooltip.

options_sfmEnabled_channelToAdd.description: The label for the channel's qualified name or URL input.

options_sfmEnabled_channelToAdd_placehol.description: The placeholder for the channel's qualified name or URL input.

options_sfmEnabled_addChannel.description: Label of the Add Channel button.

options_sfmEnabled_removeChannels.description: Label of the Remove Channels button.

options_sfmCfg.description: Label of the Configure Spoiler-Free Mode options section.

options_sfmCfg_player.description: Label of the Player options sub-section.

options_sfmCfg_player_hideDuration.description: Label of the Hide Duration option.

options_sfmCfg_player_jumpDistance.description: Label of the Jump Distance option.

options_sfmCfg_player_jumpDistance_place.description: Placeholder of the Jump Distance option.

options_sfmCfg_videoList.description: Label of the Video List options sub-section.

options_sfmCfg_videoList_hideTitle.description: Label of the Hide Title option.

options_sfmCfg_videoList_hidePreview.description: Label of the Hide Preview option.

options_sfmCfg_videoList_hideDuration.description: Label of the Hide Duration option.

options_general.description: Label of the General options section.

options_general_theatreMode.description: Label of the Player: Theatre Mode option.

options_save_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Save action.

options_save_errorMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a failed Save action.

options_restoreDefaults.description: Label of the Restore Defaults button.

options_restoreDefaults_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Restore Defaults action.
